ComicInfo.Summary:
After Lily's capture at the hands of F.I.R.E., Celia found her young son hidden safely away by his mother's enchantments. Enraged, she confronts an old friend, one of the very superheroes responsible.
Peacekeeper doesn't believe Lily deserves the fate she's been handed any more than Celia does, and the two reluctantly team up to exploit the most powerful weapon Celia has at her disposal: fear.
